title: Poga훾ar Shatters KOMs, Moves Up Monument Ranking in Fastest Tour of Flanders Ever
content:
Stat attack: Tadej Poga훾ar smashed Strava KOMs, claimed his eighth monument and won in the rainbow jersey to join elite company, all in the fastest Tour of Flanders ever recorded.

Read the full article at Poga훾ar Shatters KOMs, Moves Up Monument Ranking in Fastest Tour of Flanders Ever on Velo.
author: ahood
